name: Atm-with-cash
tagline: Crowd-sourced Android application which shows list of nearby ATMs with Cash.
body:
# ATM with CASH **Crowd-source Android application which shows list of nearby ATMs with Cash.**
**It does not require manual tagging of ATM with Cash. All processes are automatic** ## Installation and How to use ```sh -Install the app -Give Location and Message read permission -That's it. Now it will shows list of naerby ATM with Cash. ``` ## How it works ```sh - Whenever any user withdraw money from ATM,he gets sms from the bank. - It reads the sms extract all details like Bank name,ATM name etc. (No amount details) - Then it gets user location. - Now it sync all these information to server. ``` ```sh - Whenever user opens the app,it fetches the ATM details which is closer to the user location from server. - It also navigates the user to nearest ATM. ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
